Description.MetadataDescription: Preview new features and capabilities coming soon to Roblox. Get a glimpse into and help shape the future of the platform.
Description.CreatorRoadMap: We are focused on providing you with solutions to make creation easier and more immersive. Use this roadmap to get a preview of some of the new features and capabilities coming soon to Roblox.
Description.Disclaimer: Disclaimer: The Creator Roadmap is not a comprehensive list of all upcoming features, and the details of the proposed features may change or some may not launch at all. Launch windows, e.g. (Mid 2023), are approximate and subject to change.
Description.CreateHoweverYouWant: We aim to make it easy and intuitive for everyone to express themselves. Whether you're building experiences or designing accessories, we'll support more ways for you to create.
Heading.EasyCreation: Easy creation, optimized for your ideal workflows
Heading.StudioBugs: Studio will address long-standing bugs and pain points
Heading.CloudCreation: Cloud creation improves collaboration and reliability
Description.GrowAudience: Did you know that 100 of the top 150 experiences were created last year? We're making it easier for new experiences to build a global audience and giving you tools to engage and retain users.
Heading.RobloxHome: Roblox Home page connects you to your ideal audience
Heading.Matchmaking: Match your users to the best server
Heading.GrowingCreator: Benefit from a growing creator ecosystem
Description.GrowingCreator: We will support you with a thriving ecosystem that simplifies the challenging aspects of creation. These offerings will enhance your productivity, maintain a safe and civil platform, and offer you new ways to earn.
Heading.CreatorHubSuccess: Creator Hub is your key to success
Description.CreatorHubSuccess: We're equipping you with all the information you need to maximize your success with open-source  documentation, actionable recommendations to grow your experience, and timely notifications when your attention is needed.
Description.JoinTheCommunity: The Forum is a collaborative resource where you can read about new features, share your input on upcoming features, and connect with other creators. Join in on the discussions and help shape the future of creation on Roblox.
Heading.EarnAndAdvertise: More ways to earn and advertise
Heading.LearnConnectCreate: Learn, connect, and create with one another
Heading.Insight: Actionable insights to grow your experience
Heading.Personalization: Notifications and personalization keep you informed
Heading.Collaborate: Collaborate more efficiently as a team
Description.PowerfulSearchAugUpdate: We're empowering users to explore a variety of content that matches their interests and passions, and be able to find anything that exists on Roblox. These improved discovery tools will deliver more relevant traffic to your experience and help new experiences get discovered more quickly.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Dynamic Filters{boldEnd} - A community-requested feature that will enable users to find your experience based on genre or tag (On Hold){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Algorithmically-Generated Categories and Sorts{boldEnd} - Highlighting new, high quality, and trending experiences (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Combined Search & Discovery{boldEnd} - Merging Discover functionality with Search to simplify navigation. Search, browse, and filter all in one place (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Semantic Similarity Search{boldEnd} - Improving results through context, especially for non-english queries (On-going){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.RobloxHomeSepUpdate: The Roblox Home page connects people with experiences that they will love, and will help you find your ideal audience. Every user's Home page connects them to new experiences through a state-of-the-art recommendation engine. We aim to make it easier for every Roblox experience to engage and grow their user base by recommending the experience to the right audience.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Continuous Home{boldEnd} - Improving discovery on the Home page through an extended, continually scrollable feed (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Social and Contextual Descriptors{boldEnd} - Labels like Friend presence in the experience and Genre to distinguish different types of experiences on the Home page (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Recommendation Algorithm Improvements{boldEnd} - This is an on-going effort, we will continue to improve recommendations for users. (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.CreateWorldsDecUpdate: We are releasing aerodynamic simulation as our first fluid dynamics force, enabling completely new types of physically-accurate content. We're also significantly improving Future lighting's performance so that we can enable it on Android and make it our default lighting model.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Global Wind{boldEnd} - A new property to add more richness to your worlds with grass, clouds, and even falling leaves that move with the wind ({globalWindLinkStart}Live{globalWindLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Aerodynamic Forces{boldEnd} - Aerodynamic properties, such as air density, to better simulate flight for objects like wingsuits ({aerodynamicLinkStart}Live{aerodynamicLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Future Lighting Android Beta{boldEnd} - Future lighting model available as a beta feature on Android devices (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Future Lighting Studio Default{boldEnd} - Future lighting as the default lighting model, boosting the visual quality of experiences for more creators (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Audio APIs{boldEnd} - Audio API empowers developers with increased control over audio, particularly voice, so devs can explore new ways to remix audio and create realistic sound in experience. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Mesh & Image APIs (formerly Texture){boldEnd} - First step in a new era of creation where developers have direct access to meshes and textures in Lua ({meshImagesApiLinkStart}Live in Studio{meshImagesApiLinkEnd}), and coming to in-experience (2024). {listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Video uploads{boldEnd} - 13+ and ID-verified creators can upload 30s short form videos to their experiences ({videoUploadsLinkStart}Live{videoUploadsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}New Voxel Light Grid{boldEnd} - Improvements to lighting to bring the highest quality option to as many devices as possible-- includes shadows, specular highlights, light reflection. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Customizable grass height{boldEnd} - Allows devs to adjust the height of grass in their experience. Launching as non-scriptable properties for Grass Height and Grass Density in Roblox Studio, working on API ({grassLinkStart}Live{grassLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Upper Body Tracking{boldEnd} - Upper body tracking translates arm and torso movement onto your avatar in real time using the same technology as facial animation. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Physics Solver{boldEnd} - New and improved physics solver that enables more complex mechanisms and makes existing mechanisms more robust (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Fluid physics improvements{boldEnd} - Improved hydrodynamic forces and more realistic water behavior (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved debuggability of the Physics system{boldEnd} - Improve the ability to debug physics in Studio by visualizing force/torques, overhauling the pause functionality, adding the ability to step through physics frames when paused, and adding the ability to temporarily simulate selected parts in edit mode. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}CSG on Meshes{boldEnd} - Perform CSG (Constructive Solid Geometry) operations like Union, Intersect and Subtract on Meshes in Studio and in-experience (2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.NotificationsDecUpdate: {developerInvitesLinkStart}Developer-driven Invites{developerInvitesLinkEnd} are a new way to customize and improve the invite experience for users, and some creators are already reporting a 10x increase in players joining their friends. We aim to make it even easier for you to reach your community, and help you optimize the value of each notification.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Real-Time Experience Invites{boldEnd} - Send invitations to players who are currently active on Roblox ({invitesLinkStart}Live{invitesLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Notification Analytics{boldEnd} - Additional aggregated data provided via Creator Analytics (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Universal Experience Notifications API{boldEnd} - Create any kind of notification for your experiences, beyond just invites (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Notification Insights{boldEnd} - Automated suggestions to help improve the efficiency of your messages (2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.CloudCreationDecUpdate: Large, lifelike worlds will require heavy computational power and vast amounts of storage to create. Offloading these needs to the cloud will ensure that you can reliably create megascale experiences without disruption, while collaborating with teams of any size.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Team Create Invitations{boldEnd} - See invite notifications and share URLs to send collaborators directly to your Place in Studio ({teamCreateInvitesLinkStart}Live{teamCreateInvitesLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Collaborator Activity{boldEnd} - View who's actively contributing to your experiences from the Start page ({collaboratorActivityLinkStart}Live{collaboratorActivityLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Team Create Assets{boldEnd} - Access newly uploaded assets without needing to restart (Late 2023){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Studio Reconnection{boldEnd} - Automatically reconnect after a temporary connectivity loss ({reconnectionLinkStart}Live{reconnectionLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Granular Collaborator Permissions{boldEnd} - Give collaborators scoped access to your experiences in Team Create. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Experience Activity History{boldEnd} - View history of collaboration activities and configuration changes in your experiences. {activityHistoryLinkStart}Live on Creator Hub{activityHistoryLinkEnd}. Coming to Studio in Early 2024.{listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Live Collaborator Presence in Studio{boldEnd} - Easily track active collaborators and jump to where they are working in Team Create (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Enhance Drafts{boldEnd} - Focusing on live scripting and performance improvement (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.LearnConnectCreateDecUpdate: Creation on Roblox is constantly evolving, and we strive to make it easy for users of all skill levels to learn and grow with the platform. In the coming year, we’ll improve our documentation coverage and quality, expand our learning series, grow our Creator Events program, and support creators who are making next generation experiences.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Tutorials{boldEnd} - Learn with tutorials and reference projects for building, scripting, and 3D Art. ({tutorialsLinkStart}Live{tutorialsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Open-Source Documentation{boldEnd} - Anyone in the community will be able to contribute to Creator Documentation ({opensourceDocsLinkStart}Live{opensourceDocsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Docs Available in Studio{boldEnd} - Access advice and code samples directly from Studio (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}{gameFundLinkStart}Game Fund{gameFundLinkEnd}{boldEnd} - Supporting creators who want to build the next generation of Roblox experiences with a $35 million investment (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Experts in Dev Forum{boldEnd} - Roblox staff can create articles and guides in Dev Forum about existing features, platform insights, and more. This is a new genre of information to share with creators beyond feature announcements and canonical documentation. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Updated Experience Templates{boldEnd} - Re-releasing some experience templates with much needed updates (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Tutorials in-Studio{boldEnd} - New Roblox-created tutorials for new and growing creators. Tutorials can be found through Studio Start and followed without leaving Studio (2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.InsightDecUpdate: Many top Roblox creators already use analytics to grow their experiences, but data can be overwhelming. We want to offer everyone the power of a trusted data analyst, to help you interpret complicated data patterns and know what actions to take next.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Real Time Stats{boldEnd} - See live user stats, frame rate, memory usage, and more ({performanceLinkStart}Live{performanceLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Real Time Error Report{boldEnd} - Identify and fix server and client errors and warnings({errorReportingLinkStart}Live{errorReportingLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Insights{boldEnd} - Focus on the most important metrics to grow your creations ({insightsLinkStart}Live{insightsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Analytics for Avatar Items{boldEnd} - Track sales and revenue trends overall and for each avatar item. ({analyticsAvatarLinkStart}Live{analyticsAvatarLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Analytics for Experience Items and Passes{boldEnd} - See developer product and game pass revenue by item ({analyticsItemsPassesLinkStart}Live{analyticsItemsPassesLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Acquisition Analytics Improvements{boldEnd} - See new user home recommendations conversion rate and icon and title annotations ({acquisitionAnalyticsLinkStart}Live{acquisitionAnalyticsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Session Time for New vs. Returning Users{boldEnd} - See session time split by new and returning users. Monitor session time drop off (e.g., 30% of your new users dropped off 30 sec in) (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Standard Event Schema{boldEnd} - Instrument to unlock funnel charts such as level progression and economy source vs. sink (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Data Export API{boldEnd} - Export raw analytics data for your experiences (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}External Acquisition Source{boldEnd} - See where new users are coming from externally. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Insights and Benchmarks{boldEnd} - Improve signal to help creators take action. (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.PersonalizationDecUpdate: It's important to know what's going on with your assets, experiences, collaborators, and the platform at large. This information allows you to take the right actions at the right time, and we want to make it even simpler to take advantage of insights and customize them.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Expanded Notifications{boldEnd} - Get informed about critical events like a spike in crash rates, a collaboration invite, or a 'right to be forgotten' request (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Creator Hub Homepage{boldEnd} - View everything important to you—such as experience management, top-line analytics, and more—together, in one view ({creatorHubHomePageLinkStart}Live{creatorHubHomePageLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Expanded Creator Hub Homepage{boldEnd} - Personalized insights unique to you from across all of Creator Hub. This includes: announcements, analytical insights, educational content, and much more to come. We're also excited to brighten your Creator Hub experience with a new {lightModeLinkStart}light mode{lightModeLinkEnd} option! ({creatorHomePageLinkStart}Ongoing{creatorHomePageLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Creator Notifications in Studio{boldEnd} - Access notifications directly from Studio, and support new use cases like collaboration invitations ({creatorNotificationLinkStart}Live{creatorNotificationLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Notifications in Creator Hub{boldEnd} - Easily stay informed about important updates anywhere on Creator Hub with notifications (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.CollaborateDecUpdate: Most top experiences are developed by teams, and Roblox wants to make it even easier for you to collaborate. Talent Hub will help you connect with people to grow your team, and we are re-building ‘Groups' from the ground up to make it easier to manage permissions.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Reputation Ranking in Talent Hub{boldEnd} - See more listings from reputable employers and creators ({talentHubRankingLinkStart}Live{talentHubRankingLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Manual Paid Experience Ownership Transfer{boldEnd} - Transfer ownership from an account to a Group for a fee, with a manual request to Roblox. ({ownershipLinkStart}Live{ownershipLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Self-serve Experience Ownership Transfer{boldEnd} - Free, self-service experience transfer from account to group. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Creator Groups in Creator Hub{boldEnd} - Assign more specific permissions to roles, provide multiple roles to a member, and add collaborators with a new invite flow. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Overhauled Group Revenue{boldEnd} - Pay out collaborators directly within Creator Hub, and define more granular percentage splits by revenue source rather than total Group revenue. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Asset Privacy and Permissions{boldEnd} - Improve sharing for audio & video assets. Enable asset owners to share with their friends ({assetPrivacyLinkStart}Live{assetPrivacyLinkEnd}) and groups (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.EmpowerCommunicationDecUpdat: People already use Roblox to connect with friends. We will be enabling new ways for users to connect, share, and express themselves, and provide creators with tools and APIs to build new forms of communication experiences.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Roblox Connect{boldEnd} - Connect will offer a suite of APIs and reference code examples to support developers in building experiences for communication and connection. ({robloxConnectLinkStart}Live{robloxConnectLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Updated experience controls{boldEnd} - Consistent and adaptive experience controls that make it easier for users to find their most frequently used action. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Screenshots{boldEnd} - Capture screenshots from in-experience and share with friends ({screenshotsLinkStart}Live{screenshotsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.RobloxCloudDecUpdate: {cloudLinkStart}Roblox Cloud{cloudLinkEnd} will support a broader application ecosystem through a set of flexible and secure web APIs. We envision a world where you'll be able to automate workflows through scripts, publish via the command line, or create bots to help manage your community.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}OAuth2 Public Release{boldEnd} - Log in to third-party services (eg analytics or community management bots) using your Roblox account ({oauth2LinkStart}Live{oauth2LinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Inventory API{boldEnd} - Check if a user owns an item ({inventoryLinkStart}Live{inventoryLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Group API{boldEnd} - A new way to manage groups ({inventoryLinkStart}Live{inventoryLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Simplify 'Right to be Forgotten' (GDPR) Process{boldEnd} - Reference solution that uses Webhooks and Open Cloud Data Store APIs to automatically process incoming requests ({GDPRLinkStart}Live{GDPRLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Cloud Service Management{boldEnd} - Additional visibility and customization for services like Memory Stores ({cloudServiceLinkStart}Live{cloudServiceLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Universe APIs{boldEnd} - Update the metadata, such as the description, for your experience (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Secret Store for HTTPService{boldEnd} - Securely store and attach secrets (like API keys and credentials) to access external services separately from code. No more plain text. ({secretLinkStart}Currently in beta{secretLinkEnd}). Targeting GA in Q1.{listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved delivery of 3D meshes{boldEnd} - LoD (Level of Detail) generation for your meshes will be much better and continuously improve over time. More optimized delivery for 3D meshes to reduce client asset download times. (2024) {listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.AccelerateCreationDecUpdate: Creator Marketplace contains millions of high-quality assets, but it’s not always easy to find them. We aim to connect you with the perfect asset for any occasion and ensure everything you find in the Creator Marketplace is safe to use. We have also heard your feedback about Creator Marketplace monetization, and will be rolling out a plan to improve earnings for asset creators.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Richer Audio Discovery{boldEnd} - Category support in Web and Studio (Live){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Search{boldEnd} - Find assets using descriptive language like 'red convertible car' or 'ambient restaurant sounds' ({improvedSearchLinkStart}Live{improvedSearchLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}List View Beta{boldEnd} - Making it easier to browse large asset collections in Toolbox (On hold){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Additional Spam & Plagiarism Protections{boldEnd} - More rigorous plagiarism detection and punishments for repeat offenders (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Personalized Asset Recommendations{boldEnd} - Discover assets based on the content in your experience (Live){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.SafetyAndModerationDecUpdate: Our safety features, tools, and moderation capabilities have been built into the design of our product. We are continuing to work to make those capabilities smarter and stronger over time and will be investing more heavily in the detection and prevention of in-experience exploits.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Moderation Precision{boldEnd} - We are working hard to lessen the burden of asset moderation while keeping the community safe (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Anti-Cheat{boldEnd} - Improving client-side and server-side anti-cheat, and giving you more ways to identify and block cheaters using {byfronLinkStart}Byfron's technology{byfronLinkEnd} (Live){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Alt-Account Detection{boldEnd} - Take action on repeat offenders and help us combat exploiters on Roblox (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Adding Strong Language Support to 17+ Experiences{boldEnd} - Formerly known as relaxed text filters. We have changed the scope of this product to allow 17+ experiences to optionally enable strong language in text within experience ({strongLanguageSupportLinkStart}Live{strongLanguageSupportLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Banning API{boldEnd} - API that allows devs to ban specific users from an experience and automatically handles alt accounts. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Tools to manage Intellectual Property{boldEnd} - New centralized place for developers to easily manage the intellectual property rights of their creations (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Reporting & Appeals{boldEnd} - New centralized location for creators to manage their appeals ({appealsLinkStart}Live{appealsLinkEnd}) and reports (in the future){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.EarnAndAdvertiseDecUpdate: We recently introduced {immersiveAdsRolloutLinkStart}Immersive Ads{immersiveAdsRolloutLinkEnd}, which allow developers to place high-quality, native ad units in their experience. These innovative ad units offer a new way for you to publish and earn from advertisements.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Immersive Ads{boldEnd} - Providing a new path for you to monetize your experiences. We expect CPMs to increase as more advertisers participate and more developers serve ads in their experiences ({immersiveAdsLinkStart}Live{immersiveAdsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Ads Manager{boldEnd} - Create Immersive Ads with our self-serve Ads Manager tool for ad creation, management, reporting and billing ({adsManagerLinkStart}Live{adsManagerLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Sponsored Ads Improvements{boldEnd} - Better targeting, reporting, and delivery for your sponsored ads. ({sponsoredAdsLiveLinkStart}Live{sponsoredAdsLiveLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Earn more on Creator Marketplace sales{boldEnd} - Creators will get 100% of Creator Marketplace sales in Creator Hub and Studio minus sales taxes and payment processing fees. Items will be priced and sold in $USD instead of Robux and no longer subject to DevEx. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Subscriptions within experiences{boldEnd} - Creators will be able to offer recurring subscriptions in their experiences. In September, ID/phone-verified creators with experiences created before September will be able to access tooling for testing. Users will be able to purchase starting in November. ({subscriptionsLinkStart}Live{subscriptionsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Immersive Ads video ad format and reporting{boldEnd} - Launch the video ad format for Immersive Ads to provide advertisers with new ways to express their ideas and provide new opportunities for publishers to earn. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Ads targeting{boldEnd} - More targeting options for advertisers to reach people interested in specific genres and other dimensions. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Subscribe within experiences with Roblox Credit{boldEnd} - Users can purchase subscriptions within experience with Roblox Credit, in addition to the saved card payment method offered today (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Expanded Subscription API functionality {boldEnd} - Allow developers to access more information on subscriber status and subscription analytics. Subscription APIs will also be available on Open Cloud (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Subscription promotions{boldEnd} - Enabling devs to run promotions on subscriptions (e.g. free trial or discounted first month) (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Subscription description updates{boldEnd} - Safely enabling the ability to edit and update the description of active subscriptions (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.GenerativeAIDecUpdate: Roblox is building Generative AI tools to scale your creation efforts and let you focus on the aspects that matter most. This technology will help you learn, code, debug, build faster, iterate more, and augment your skills to create even better content.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}{generatorLinkStart}Material Generator{generatorLinkEnd} Full Release{boldEnd} - Quickly generate visually-compelling materials using natural language (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}{assistLinkStart}Code Assist{assistLinkEnd} Full Release{boldEnd} - Powerful code generation tool for both experienced and new scripters (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Assistant Beta{boldEnd} - Find answers, explain, debug, and iterate on code, build immersive experiences and texture objects faster with Assistant. Assistant will be available in {assistantCreatorHubLinkStart}Creator Hub{assistantCreatorHubLinkEnd} and Studio. ({assistantBetaLinkStart}Live{assistantBetaLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}AI Texturing{boldEnd} - Text to texture generation to re-style your 3d meshes (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.AvatarCreationDecUpdate: Avatars are a core part of Roblox. From using them to communicate to creating your own, our avatar features mimic real-life communication, empower self-expression, and drive creation. Here are some of the features we are enabling to create a community-led Marketplace where any creator can make an avatar that is expressive, communicative, and personalized:{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}glTF File Support{boldEnd} - Import avatar rigs in standard formats ({gltfLinkStart}Live{gltfLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Avatar Face and Body Tooling{boldEnd} - Enhancing how you can import, create, and publish avatar assets (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Bodies and Animated Faces{boldEnd} - Members of the {ugcLinkStart}UGC Program{ugcLinkEnd} and later all creators will be able to create items in the Marketplace including bodies and animated faces ({bodiesAndHeadLinkStart}Live{bodiesAndHeadLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Community-led Marketplace{boldEnd} - Anyone can publish avatar items to the Marketplace. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Photo to Avatar{boldEnd} - Create avatars from photo and text prompts using generative AI (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Accessory Adjustment Tool{boldEnd} - Avatar editor tool that allows you to adjust the size and placement of accessories on your avatar (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.MatchmakingDecUpdate: Matchmaking is at the heart of Roblox's vision for connecting people. We abstract away the complexity of game server management and use signals like friends, latency, language, age, and server occupancy to direct users to the server most likely to maximize engagement.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Scalability{boldEnd} - Better support for large traffic spikes (Live){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Auto-Reconnect{boldEnd} - Connect players to the same server following an update (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Flexible Join Destination{boldEnd} - Send your users to non-root places when they join ({flexibleJoinLinkStart}Live{flexibleJoinLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Friend Invites{boldEnd} - A revamped experience invitation flow that makes it easier to group up with friends. ({friendInviteLinkStart}Live{friendInviteLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Prewarming{boldEnd} - Enable significantly faster join times by provisioning experience instances in advance for high-volume experiences. ({prewarmingLinkStart}Live{prewarmingLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Social Context and Experience Hop Prompts{boldEnd} - At join time, users will see which of their friends are in the server. If a friend has left, the banner will indicate which experience they have moved to, with an option to follow them. ({socialContextLinkStart}Live{socialContextLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.LanguageBarriersDecUpdate: We strive to empower all our users to communicate with one another, regardless of language. By dissolving communication barriers, Roblox will help your community stay more closely connected, which will lead to increased engagement.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Automatic Chat Translations{boldEnd} - In-experience chat automatically translated to supported languages (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}In-Experience Translation Feedback{boldEnd} - Allow users to share suggestions on ways you can improve your localization quality (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Translated Documentation for 7 Languages{boldEnd} - Added support for 7 languages (including Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese) so you can read in your preferred languages. ({translationLinkStart}Live{translationLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Fully translated documentation for 95% of creators{boldEnd} - Machine translation will let the majority of creators read documentation in their native language. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}New Regions{boldEnd} - Shipped support for four new locales on platform by the end of 2023 - Indonesian, Thai, Turkish, and Vietnamese. Will add two locales in 2024.{listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Image Translation{boldEnd} - Automatically translate text inside images while matching the style and feel of the original image. (2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.RobloxDevicesDecUpdate: Roblox is one of the largest immersive platforms available anywhere. As devices evolve and new versions become available, we want to provide everyone on Roblox with the best experience possible for their device. Creators can publish experiences once and immediately get them into the hands of a global audience across all of the platforms we support.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Meta Quest Full Release{boldEnd} - Bring your experiences to Meta Quest. ({metaQuestLinkStart}Live{metaQuestLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}PlayStation Full Release{boldEnd} - Bring your experiences to PlayStation. ({playStationLinkStart}Live{playStationLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Heading.EngineExperience: Engine can support any type of experience
Description.EasyCreationDecUpdate: Our vision is to provide powerful, flexible workflows for creators to build next-generation immersive 3D experiences and user-generated content (UGC). We are building a foundation that will make it easier than ever to create high quality content, while adding flexibility to your day-to-day tasks. We are also exploring ways we can open the platform in a stable, supported, and future-proof way and will be holding several 'Office Hours' sessions in the near future to share more and answer your questions. {listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}{selectionLinkStart}Selection Improvements{selectionLinkEnd}, {explorerLinkStart}Explorer Search Filter{explorerLinkEnd}, and {multiCursorLinkStart}Multi-Cursor{multiCursorLinkEnd} in Script Editor{boldEnd} - Full release thanks to your beta{listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Drag Detectors Beta{boldEnd} - Make objects in your experience draggable and interactive without scripting ({dragDetectorsLinkStart}Live{dragDetectorsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Camera Speed and Rotation{boldEnd} - Easier control while moving the camera ({cameraLinkStart}Live{cameraLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Next Generation Studio Ribbon{boldEnd} - A completely redesigned Studio Ribbon with easy access to the tools and plugins that best match your unique workflows (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Live Scripting Beta{boldEnd} - Script collaboratively with streamlined version history, like editing a cloud document with your team ({liveScriptingLinkStart}Live{liveScriptingLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Window Context Cues{boldEnd} - Visual indicators of Play/Test state in the Viewport. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Studio Luau File Sync Beta{boldEnd} - Export/import scripts between Studio and disk, so that you can use any IDE or version control system. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Engine Open Cloud API Beta (Scripting only){boldEnd} - Use Open Cloud APIs for cloud based workflows or external IDEs. We're starting with scripting but plan to expand to the entire data model. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Public packages on Creator Marketplace{boldEnd} - Packages can be shared publicly on Creator Marketplace (2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.StudioBugsDecUpdate: Studio is a professional tool supporting long periods of sustained creation. Description.Notifications2024AprilUpdate: {developerInvitesLinkStart}Developer-driven Invites{developerInvitesLinkEnd} are a new way to customize and improve the invite experience for users, and some creators are already reporting a 10x increase in players joining their friends. We aim to make it even easier for you to reach your community, and help you optimize the value of each notification.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Notification Analytics{boldEnd} - Additional aggregated data provided via Creator Analytics. ({experienceNotificationsLinkStart}Live{experienceNotificationsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Universal Experience Notifications API{boldEnd} - Create any kind of notification for your experiences, beyond just invites. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}

This technology will help you learn, code, debug, build faster, iterate more, and augment your skills to create even better content. {listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Material Generator Full Release{boldEnd} - Quickly generate visually-compelling materials using natural language. Description.RobloxHome2024AprilUpdate: The Roblox Home page connects people with experiences that they will love, and will help you find your ideal audience. Every user's Home page connects them to new experiences through a state-of-the-art recommendation engine. We aim to make it easier for every Roblox experience to engage and grow their user base by recommending the experience to the right audience.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Continuous Home{boldEnd} - Improving discovery on the Home page through an extended, continually scrollable feed. (Live){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Social and Contextual Descriptors{boldEnd} - Labels like Friend presence in the experience, Genre and additional insights to distinguish different types of experiences on the Home page. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Thumbnail Personalization{boldEnd} - You can A/B test your thumbnails to optimize conversion. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Experience Details {boldEnd} - We're updating the Experience Details Page to improve usability and conversion. We're adding the experience icon to mobile experience pages and showing improved insights about the experience to help users decide better. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Recommendation Algorithm Improvements{boldEnd} - This is an on-going effort, we will continue to improve recommendations for users. (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Points of Interest & Events{boldEnd} - We're working on helping you drive the discovery of events and key places in your experience with a new feature: Points of Interest, which lets you highlight events, landmarks, hangout spots, quests, or any other activity in your experience. The current events platform system will be deprecated and replaced with this new system. (Mid 2024) Later in the year, we will showcase your Points of Interest and Events across Home, Experience Details, and other surfaces. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.StudioBugs2024AprilUpdate: Studio is a professional tool supporting long periods of sustained creation. Description.RobloxCloud2024AprilUpdate: {cloudLinkStart}Roblox Cloud{cloudLinkEnd} will support a broader application ecosystem through a set of flexible and secure web APIs. We envision a world where you'll be able to automate workflows through scripts, publish via the command line, or create bots to help manage your community.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Universe APIs {boldEnd} - Update the metadata, such as the description, for your experience. ({openCloudUniversesApiBetaLinkStart}Live{openCloudUniversesApiBetaLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Secret Store for HTTPService{boldEnd} - Securely store and attach secrets (like API keys and credentials) to access external services separately from code. ({secretStoreServiceLinkStart}Live{secretStoreServiceLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Memory Stores Enhancement{boldEnd} - Improve Memory Stores to support the key use cases better: 1) A data structure, HashMap, that has much higher limits for features like Server List, 2) Open Cloud APIs for Memory Stores that unlock use cases like external live leaderboards. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved delivery of 3D meshes{boldEnd} - LoD (Level of Detail) generation for your meshes will be much better and continuously improve over time. Description.EmpowerCommunication2024Apri: People already use Roblox to connect with friends.  We will be enabling new ways for users to connect, share, and express themselves, and provide creators with tools and APIs to build new forms of communication experiences.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Captures API{boldEnd} - The Captures APIs allow creators to include pre-set moments within experiences where a screenshot is automatically taken for users to save, share, or delete the screenshot. Description.EarnAndAdvertise2024AprilUpd: We recently introduced {immersiveAdsLinkStart}Immersive Ads{immersiveAdsLinkEnd}, which allow developers to place high-quality, native ad units in their experience. These innovative ad units offer a new way for you to publish and earn from advertisements.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Earn more on Creator Store sales{boldEnd} - Creators will get 100% of Creator Store sales in Creator Hub and Studio minus sales taxes and payment processing fees.  Items will be priced and sold in $USD instead of Robux and no longer subject to DevEx. ({creatorStoreSellerOnboardingLinkStart}Live{creatorStoreSellerOnboardingLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Immersive Ads video ad format and reporting{boldEnd} - Launch the video ad format for Immersive Ads to provide advertisers with new ways to express their ideas and provide new opportunities for publishers to earn. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Subscribe within experiences with Roblox Credit{boldEnd} - Users can purchase subscriptions within experience with Roblox Credit, in addition to the saved card payment method offered today. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Roblox Groups 'Announcements' can be posted via Guilded {boldEnd} - A community owner can now, using Guilded, send a message (Announcements) to their whole community at once. ({subscriptionsWithinExperiencesApiExpansionsLinkStart}Live{subscriptionsWithinExperiencesApiExpansionsLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Subscription promotions{boldEnd} - Enabling devs to run promotions on subscriptions (e.g. free trial or discounted first month). ({subscriptionsExpansionNewFeaturesLinkStart}Live{subscriptionsExpansionNewFeaturesLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.EngineExperience2024AprilUpd: We're focused on ensuring that Engine can help you achieve your goals regardless of your ambition.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Custom Logging {boldEnd} - Allowing you to pass error locations through pcalls. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}UI styling{boldEnd} - Stylesheets make it possible to change the look and feel of your UI with one click. They work with 3D content, too. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Occlusion culling {boldEnd} - Reduces the amount of occluded geometry rendered, which moderately to greatly improves performance depending on the scenario. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Native Code Generation{boldEnd} - Improves script performance on RCC and in Studio plugins by compiling Luau to host CPU instructions instead of interpreting bytecodes in a virtual machine (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Updated Type Solver{boldEnd} - This improves Luau script analysis including more accurate binary operators inferences and new type operators. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}DataModel Isolation and Script Capabilities{boldEnd} - Ability to insert models with scripts into experiences and have those scripts isolated from modifying the world or accessing Roblox APIs that are not explicitly allowed--making it safer to use models shared by other developers, guarantees configurable packages re limited to themselves, and empowers in-experience creation include scripting without impacting server state. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Type Inference for Native Compilation{boldEnd} - Incorporating types added by Luau into the decisions made by native code generation will allow more optimizations to performed and reduce the size of the generated native code. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Immersion Mode for VR{boldEnd} - Support for tracked controllers in VR that animate avatar arms in real time. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Haptics Controls{boldEnd} - Improved API for adding haptics to your experiences and UI across all supported platforms. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.CreateWorlds2024AprilUpdate: We are releasing aerodynamic simulation as our first fluid dynamics force, enabling completely new types of physically-accurate content. We're also significantly improving Future lighting's performance so that we can enable it on Android and make it our default lighting model.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Aerodynamic Forces{boldEnd} - Aerodynamic properties, such as air density, to better simulate flight for objects like wingsuits. Studio beta ({aerodynamicLinkStart}live{aerodynamicLinkEnd}). Working toward full release. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Future Lighting Android Beta{boldEnd} - Future lighting model available as a beta feature on Android devices. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Future Lighting Studio Default {boldEnd} - Future lighting as the default lighting model, boosting the visual quality of experiences for more creators. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Audio APIs{boldEnd} - Audio API empowers developers with increased control over audio, particularly voice, so devs can explore new ways to remix audio and create realistic sound in experience. ({audioApiBetaLinkStart}Live{audioApiBetaLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Mesh & Image APIs (formerly Texture){boldEnd} - First step in a new era of creation where developers have direct access to meshes and textures in Lua ({inExperienceMeshImageApisBetaLinkStart}Live in Studio{inExperienceMeshImageApisBetaLinkEnd}), and coming to in-experience. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Physics Solver{boldEnd} - New and improved physics solver that enables more complex mechanisms and makes existing mechanisms more robust. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Fluid physics improvements{boldEnd} - Improved hydrodynamic forces and more realistic water behavior. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved debuggability of the Physics system{boldEnd} - Improve the ability to debug physics in Studio by visualizing force/torques, overhauling the pause functionality ({pausingPhysicsInStudioBetaLinkStart}live{pausingPhysicsInStudioBetaLinkEnd}), adding the ability to step through physics frames when paused, and adding the ability to temporarily simulate selected parts in edit mode. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}CSG on Meshes{boldEnd} - Perform CSG (Constructive Solid Geometry) operations like Union, Intersect and Subtract on Meshes in Studio and in-experience. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}New voxel light grid{boldEnd} - Improvements to lighting to bring the highest quality option to as many devices as possible--includes shadows, specular highlights, light reflection. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Upper Body tracking{boldEnd} - Upper body tracking translates arm and torso movement onto your avatar in real time using the same technology as facial animation. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Audio Meta Data API{boldEnd} - Developer-facing API to help developers add audio metadata to their experiences. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.CloudCreation2024AprilUpdate: Large, lifelike worlds will require heavy computational power and vast amounts of storage to create. Offloading these needs to the cloud will ensure that you can reliably create megascale experiences without disruption, while collaborating with teams of any size.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Team Create Assets{boldEnd} - Access newly uploaded assets without needing to restart Team Create. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Granular Collaborator Permissions{boldEnd} - Give collaborators scoped access to your experiences in Team Create. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Comments & Annotations inside Studio{boldEnd} - Annotate and leave comments in Studio for your collaborators. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Experience Activity History{boldEnd} - View history of collaboration activities and configuration changes in your experiences. Live on Creator Hub. Coming to Studio. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Live Collaborator Presence in Studio{boldEnd} - Easily track active collaborators and jump to where they are working in Team Create. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Enhance Drafts {boldEnd} - Focusing on live scripting and performance improvement. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.PowerfulSearch2024AprilUpdat: We're empowering users to explore a variety of content that matches their interests and passions, and be able to find anything that exists on Roblox. These improved discovery tools will deliver more relevant traffic to your experience and help new experiences get discovered more quickly.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Dynamic Filters{boldEnd} - A community-requested feature that will enable users to find your experience based on genre or tag. (On hold){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Algorithmically-Generated Categories and Sorts{boldEnd} - Highlighting new, high quality, and trending experiences. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Combined Search & Discovery{boldEnd} - Merging Discover functionality with Search to simplify navigation. Search, browse, and filter all in one place. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Search Relevance Improvements{boldEnd} - This is an ongoing effort to improve search relevance and to improve the discoverability of new experiences. Focus areas include fixing irrelevant results and using advanced machine learning models to optimize for relevance. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Unified Search Result Page{boldEnd} - Improved ranking of experiences, people, marketplace items inside search result page and ranking them based on their relevance to the user query regardless of content type. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Clickbait suppression{boldEnd} - Working on detecting misleading and clickbait content and decreasing user exposure. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.AvatarCreation2024AprilUpdat: Avatars are a core part of Roblox. From using them to communicate to creating your own, our avatar features mimic real-life communication, empower self-expression, and drive creation. Here are some of the features we are enabling to create a community-led Marketplace where any creator can make an avatar that is expressive, communicative, and personalized:{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Improved Avatar Face and Body Tooling{boldEnd} - Enhancing how you can import, create, and publish avatar assets. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Photo to avatar {boldEnd} - Create avatars from photo and text prompts using generative AI. (2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Accessory adjustment tool{boldEnd} - Avatar editor tool that allows you to adjust the size and placement of accessories on your avatar. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}R6 to 15 Conversion Tool{boldEnd} - Streamline the conversion of existing R6 experiences to R15 with tools to migrate characters, animations and scripts. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Avatar Auto Setup{boldEnd} - Simplify and automate the creation of fully functional Roblox-ready avatars from single-mesh 3D models of humanoid-like bodies. (Late 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}UGC Validation{boldEnd} - Unified library of validation checks for UGC assets (accessories and bodies) to enforce a minimum quality bar and compatibility with existing marketplace assets. Description.Matchmaking2024AprilUpdate: Matchmaking is at the heart of Roblox's vision for connecting people. We abstract away the complexity of game server management and use signals like friends, latency, language, age, and server occupancy to direct users to the server most likely to maximize engagement. {listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Auto-Reconnect{boldEnd} - Connect players to the same server following an update. ({automaticallyReconnectDuringUpdatesLinkStart}Live{automaticallyReconnectDuringUpdatesLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.LanguageBarriers2024AprilUpd: We strive to empower all our users to communicate with one another, regardless of language. Description.SafetyAndModeration2024April: Our safety features, tools, and moderation capabilities have been built into the design of our product. We are continuing to work to make those capabilities smarter and stronger over time and will be investing more heavily in the detection and prevention of in-experience exploits. {listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Ads brand safety and suitability controls{boldEnd} - Give advertisers brand safety and suitability controls for Immersive Ads to give more control over where their ads will be shown. ({expandedPublisherEligibilityBrandSuitabilityLinkStart}Live{expandedPublisherEligibilityBrandSuitabilityLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Moderation Precision{boldEnd} - We are working hard to lessen the burden of asset moderation while keeping the community safe. (Ongoing){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Alt-Account Detection{boldEnd} - Take action on repeat offenders and help us combat exploiters on Roblox. (Mid 2024){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Rights Manager (formerly Tools to manage Intellectual Property){boldEnd} - New centralized place for developers to easily manage the intellectual property rights of their creations. ({rightsManagerLinkStart}Live{rightsManagerLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Banning API{boldEnd} - API that allows devs to ban specific users from an experience and automatically handles alt accounts. (Early 2024){listItemEnd}{listEnd}
Description.LearnConnectCreate2024AprilU: Creation on Roblox is constantly evolving, and we strive to make it easy for users of all skill levels to learn and grow with the platform. In the coming year, we'll improve our documentation coverage and quality, expand our learning series, grow our Creator Events program, and support creators who are making next generation experiences.{listStart}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Docs Available in Studio{boldEnd} - Access advice and code samples directly from Studio. ({staffArticlesLinkStart}Live{staffArticlesLinkEnd}){listItemEnd}{listItemStart}{boldStart}Updated Experience Templates{boldEnd} - Re-releasing some experience templates with much needed updates. Launched Racing template ({studioRacingTemplateLinkStart}live{studioRacingTemplateLinkEnd}), more templates coming in later this year. Description.Collaborate2024AprilUpdate: Most top experiences are developed by teams, and Roblox wants to make it even easier for you to collaborate.
